The user in the comment seems to be comparing Georgia Institute of Technology (GaTech) and Johns Hopkins University (JHU). They describe multiple opportunities for GaTech students such as hackathons, job recruitment, education programs, social life, collegiate sports, and a close proximity to businesses. Comparatively, Johns Hopkins University isn't discussed or praised to the same extensiveness, only mentioned briefly when the user suggests that GaTech's graduates may be more attractive to certain firms over JHU's graduates. Because of the heavy focus on GaTech and minimal mention of JHU without a note of comparison, it results in preference arising mainly towards Georgia Institute of Technology.

Therefore, this clarity indicates the commenter does show a preference according to comparison solely addressed on CS related subjects and opportunities towards Atlanta.
